osvSchema.details: Unrestricted File Upload vulnerability in Employee Management System 1.0 allows a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code via the edit-photo.php component.

description_data.value: ** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: CVE-2024-1008. Reason: This candidate is a duplicate of CVE-2024-1008. Notes: All CVE users should reference CVE-2024-1008 instead of this candidate.
